How can I create a currency with a specific name without having an ID of the same name?

You can't. To create a currency with a specific name, you need to have an ID of the same name. The controller of this ID is the only one who can create a currency of that name, and they can only do so once. So, if you want to create a currency called "gold", you need to have an ID called "gold@".

To create a currency of a specific name, you need an ID of the same name. The controller of this ID is the only one who can create a currency of that name, and they can only do so once.
